body:
There may be a small impact but:
1) It wasn't big enough to be picked up by the performance regression suite
2) The fast paths and inner loops avoid the runtime check by calling unsafeData
3) We can make it DEBUG only if necessary
4) We are double checking because both ATen and TH check; presumably if it's necessary we can remove the ATen check now that TH is safe.
body_html:

  3. We can make it DEBUG only if necessary
  4. We are double checking because both ATen and TH check; presumably if it's necessary we can remove the ATen check now that TH is safe.
body_text:
There may be a small impact but:

It wasn't big enough to be picked up by the performance regression suite
The fast paths and inner loops avoid the runtime check by calling unsafeData
We can make it DEBUG only if necessary
We are double checking because both ATen and TH check; presumably if it's necessary we can remove the ATen check now that TH is safe.
